contentrichtext.text: '''Rubik''' or '''Rubiks''' may refer to: ; People * [[Alfrēds Rubiks]] (born 1935), Latvian politician * [[Anja Rubik]] (born 1983), Polish fashion model * [[Ernő Rubik]] (born 1944), Hungarian professor and inventor **[[Rubik's Cube]], his most famous invention * [[Piotr Rubik]] (born 1968), Polish composer * {{link|de|Silvia Rubik}} (born 1960), Austrian politician (SPÖ) ; Other * [[Rubik, Albania]], mining town * [[Rubik (band)]], Finnish pop/rock band ==See also== *[[Rubric]] {{disambig|surname|geo}} [[Category:Polish-language surnames]] [[Category:Hungarian-language surnames]] [[Category:Albanian toponyms]]
